title: 服务器我登出后报错每次都是（附错误报告~）求解答
author: Gee咖啡猫
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Gee咖啡猫 于 2013-1-15 20:57 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!
Time: 13-1-15 下午6:47
Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.lang.AbstractMethodError: eg.getPlayer()Lqx;
 at cg.b(TcpConnection.java:462)
 at iv.d(NetServerHandler.java:74)
 at iw.b(NetworkListenThread.java:57)
 at ht.b(SourceFile:30)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.r(MinecraftServer.java:702)
 at ho.r(DedicatedServer.java:270)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.q(MinecraftServer.java:598)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:497)
 at fy.run(SourceFile:849)

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- System Details --
Details:
 Minecraft Version: 1.4.6
 Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
 Java Version: 1.7.0_09, Oracle Corporation
 Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
 Memory: 939877384 bytes (896 MB) / 1037959168 bytes (989 MB) up to 1037959168 bytes (989 MB)
 JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xms1g -Xmx1g
 AABB Pool Size: 6909 (386904 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 6680 (374080 bytes; 0 MB) used
 Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed
 IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 3, tallocated: 63
 FML: MCP v7.25 FML v4.6.17.515 Minecraft Forge 6.5.0.489 16 mods loaded, 16 mods active
 mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 mod_GuiAPI [mod_GuiAPI] (minecraft_server.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 fihgu's Teleport Mod [fihgu's Teleport Mod] (minecraft_server.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 fihgu's Protection Mod [fihgu's Protection Mod] (minecraft_server.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 fihgu's Permission Mod [fihgu's Permission Mod] (minecraft_server.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 fihgu's Login Mod [fihgu's Login Mod] (minecraft_server.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 fihgu's Core Mod [fihgu's Core Mod] (minecraft_server.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 CustomSpawner [DrZhark's CustomSpawner] (CustomMobSpawner 1.10.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 MoCreatures [DrZhark's Mo'Creatures Mod] (DrZharks MoCreatures Mod v4.4.0.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 craftguide [CraftGuide] (G键合成表.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 weaponmod [Balkon's WeaponMod] (Weaponmod 1.46汉化.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 RopesPlus [Ropes+] (绳索_1.4.6.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available
 Backpack [Backpack] (背包.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available

 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
 Vec3 Pool Size: 3251 (182056 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 2789 (156184 bytes; 0 MB) used
 Player Count: 0 / 20; []
 Is Modded: Definitely; Server brand changed to 'fml'
 Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)
这个是错误报告- -。 每次我一登出服务器就报错 然后我要重启才能进去 求解答~感谢

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 在mod的联机使用上有很大的误区、、、必须推倒重来。我想你先研究研究哪些mod是联机必需的，或者进一步理解了mod的联机兼容性，然后再弄一个服务器吧。
